document_data.name: Mirichesh
document_data.mainbody: '''Mirichesh''' was a [[dragonborn]] of [[Abeir]] and an ancestor of [[Clan Ophinshtalajiir]].
document_data.History:
Mirichesh was a renowned [[dragon]]-slayer during the [[dragonborn rebellion]].

Mirichesh was one of the dragonborn clan leaders who took part in the [[battle of the Crippled Mountain]]. While [[Iskdara]], [[Shurideh]], [[Reshvemi]], and [[Thuchir]] infiltrated the [[Crippled Mountain|Celestial Mountain]] to kill [[Rhodrolytharnestrix]], Mirichesh was one of the clan leaders who led the dragonborn rebels against Rhodrolytharnestrix's dragon army.

Mirichesh survived the final battle and was one of the founders of [[Tymanchebar]], and presumably, he was the first patriarch of Clan Ophinshtalajiir.
